type: Legendary Creature – Human Bird Archer Knight
rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i][i]Morbid[/i] [i]Celebration[/i][/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Reina dies, you gain life equal to that creatures toughness.
[i]Amaterasu[/i] – If another creature you control would deal damage to a creature you don't control, Reina, [/i][i]Morbid[/i][i] Fixation deals 1 damage to that creature in addition.
